name: Aurore
description: subscription service for lingerie and nightwear

jobs.title: Marketing
jobs.description:
I am looking for a talented proactive Marketing guru to drive sales, collaborations and publications for our brand.

Aurore is a young luxury lingerie brand focused on ethical production. We understand that lingerie is the most important part of the wardrobe, and thus tasked ourselves with empowering women through luxury lingerie.

We stand in the "affordable luxury segment" focusing on quality of materials and handmade production.

IG: @aurorelingerie
https://aurore.world
